title: Customized Educational Design Strategies through MOOC Learner Behavior Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment using digital devices, requiring consideration of diverse learner characteristics (gender, age, educational level)

learning_goals: Learners can explain types of data collected on MOOC platforms and analytical methods
Learners can design personalized learning pathways based on learner behavior data
Through project-based assessments, learners can propose practical MOOC learning environment improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
